title: From Partners to Parents
brief_description: From Partners to Parents is a program about the effects of a first baby on a marriage. It focuses on the adjustments faced by a young couple during the year following the birth of their first child and illustrates the different perceptions and reactions of each partner to some of the central issues of parenthood.
